definition: variant of 手[shou3] in 扒手[pa2 shou3]
variant of 扒[pa2] in 扒手[pa2 shou3]
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: The man always holds woman's hand closely to grasp.
sentences.chinese: 男亽始終抓住女亽旳掱緊緊握著。

sentences.english: We hold hands, look up to happiness.
sentences.chinese: 皒們緊握雙掱，仰望幸福。

sentences.english: The pickpocket was caught in the act.
sentences.chinese: 掱手在行竊是被捉住了。

sentences.english: A true friend is the only one who holds your hand And touches your heart.
sentences.chinese: 一個眞正的朋友會握著妳的掱，觸動妳的惢。

definition: one of the characters used in kwukyel (phonetic "ra"), an ancient Korean writing system
(used in female given names)/variant of 婀[e1]
15th day of month (lunar calendar)/old variant of 望[wang4]
